name: Tetris Bliss
description:
"Tetris Bliss" is a classic Tetris game, the game through the arrow keys or AWSD to control the rotation or movement of falling blocks. When a row is full, the row is eliminated.
Eliminating a row will get the energy value, and when the energy value is full, you can get a gift box, which can open a whole map, or it may open a fragment of the map. Collect enough images to unlock an entire image.
The game is full of fun and challenge, and players can enjoy simple yet strategic gameplay. Quick reaction and accurate operation are the key to getting high scores.
